Detailed Description

A connectless socket.

A connectless socket. Server side socket binds an address and accept packet by recvfrom. Client side may connect to a server or just use send to, recvfrom without connecting to any host. 

 UDPSocket socket;
 socket.sendTo(IPEndPoint(IP4Address(127, 0, 0, 1), 5000), buffer);

Definition at line 31 of file UDPSocket.h.

Member Function Documentation

RESULT gaia::net::UDPSocket::bind ( const IPEndPoint &  address)

Bind to an address.

Before any read/write operation, connect() or bind() should be called. If address is not specified, use 0.0.0.0 as address and 0 as port number, the socket will bind an arbitrary port on all address. 

   udp.bind(IPEndPoint(IP4Address(0, 0, 0, 0), 0));  // Will bind arbitrary address.
Parameters:
addressAddress of remote server.
Returns:
An error code.
